column4: I have another question, I'm pretty new to Linux (exWindows user) and I was wondering what firewalls, antispyware, antivirus software there is out there for Linux? I used to use things like zonealarm, ad-aware, avg, etc.. for Windows.
Do I have to configure these iptables or enable them? Or should this already be done?
So in terms of security, I shouldn't worry too much?
just common sense.. i personally hate software firewalls, whether i'm using linux or Windows, so I always recommend a good router/firewall w/ stateful packet inspection.. beyond that, i do nothing.
